com.meat

Class MainGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • com.meat.MainGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class MainGame
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    The main game class, used for passing values between levels and other screens, also has a simple save game feature.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame()
              throws java.io.IOException

      • setScore

        public void setScore(int numTomatoes,
                     java.lang.String lvlString)
        Retrieves the number of tomatoes received in the last completed level if the level of trophy is higher than what was earned previously, adds it to the trophy array for that level.
        Parameters:
        numTomatoes - Number of tomatoes earned in the last completed level.
        lvlString - Name of the level completed.

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame()
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        retrieves the save information from the save file. Updates the lvlTrophies array with data from the text file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
